TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceFabricClusterResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a ServiceFabricCluster along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetServiceFabricClusterResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetServiceFabricCluster method.

Docs.summary: If a target is not provided, it will get the minimum and maximum versions available from the current cluster version. If a target is given, it will provide the required path to get from the current cluster version to the target version. Request Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ServiceFabric/clusters/{clusterName}/listUpgradableVersions Operation Id: Clusters_ListUpgradableVersions
